scripts.update: npm run clean && npm run download && npm run generate && npm run build
scripts.clean: npm run clean:svg && npm run clean:path
scripts.clean:svg: set -eu; for w in 100 200 300 400 500 600 700; do npx @material-design-icons/scripts delete svg --symbols --in svg/$w; done
scripts.download: npm run download:font && npm run download:fonts && npm run download:svg && npm run download:metadata && npm run copy:metadata
scripts.download:fonts: set -eu; for w in 100 200 300 400 500 600 700; do npx @material-design-icons/scripts download font --symbols --evergreen --weight $w --grade 0 --size 48 --to font/$w; done
scripts.download:svg: set -eu; for w in 100 200 300 400 500 600 700; do npx @material-design-icons/scripts download svg --symbols --weight $w --to svg/$w; done
scripts.generate: npm run generate:types && npm run copy:types
scripts.copy:types: set -eu; for w in 100 200 300 400 500 600 700; do cp material-symbols/index.d.ts font/$w; done
scripts.build: npm run build:font && npm run build:svg; npm run build:path
scripts.version: set -eu; for ws in material-symbols metadata; do npm version -w $ws; done; for w in 100 200 300 400 500 600 700; do for type in font svg path; do npm version -w $type/$w; done; done
scripts.postversion: npm install && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./material-symbols/package.json').version") npm run git-commit-tag
scripts.publish: set -eu; for ws in material-symbols metadata; do npm publish -w $ws; done; for w in 100 200 300 400 500 600 700; do for type in font svg path; do npm publish -w $type/$w; done; done
